trait.name: Camouflage
text: A moss lurker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in forested or swampy terrain.

trait.name: Love of Heavy Weapons
text: While moss lurkers can use heavy weapons, they have disadvantage while wielding them.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
text: The moss lurker has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Poisoned Gifts
text: A moss lurker can contaminate liquids or food with poison. Someone who consumes the contaminated substance must make a successful DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. When the poison is introduced, the moss lurker can choose a poison that also causes the victim to fall unconscious, or to become paralyzed while poisoned in this way. An unconscious creature wakes if it takes damage, or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

action.name: Great Sword or Maul
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing or bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mushroom-Poisoned Javelin
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) poison damage and the target is poisoned until the start of the moss lurker's next turn. A successful DC 11 Constitution save halves the poison damage and prevents poisoning.

action.name: Dropped Boulder
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100 ft. (vertically), one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage.
